# [Interview #1162: Shadows of Self-San Jose, Entry #49](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1162#49)

#### Question

Youâ€™ve spoken before how DNA exists on multiple different levels in your magic systems. I hear somewhere that Hemalurgy actually splices something into your DNA - so what does that imply for inheritability?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It is not inheritable.
